strapiPost.title: Mount Sequoyah Hosts Second Annual Fayetteville Movement Festival
strapiPost.content:
Mount Sequoyah will host the 2nd annual Fayetteville Movement Festival, featuring a weekend of dance, yoga, functional movement, deep relaxation, live music, and more with movement professionals and local artists, from Jun 30 - Jul 2.

  • Creative movement: Open to people of all ages and backgrounds, the Fayetteville Movement Festival will be a weekend of connecting with the self and the community, building resilience and creativity through movement. Don't miss the Open Mic Night on Friday, hosted by Bxmbi, as poets, musicians, and theatrical performers showcase their talents.
  • Let's get moving: Whether you have previous experience with the art of movement or just getting started and want to feel more in sync with your body, the variety of classes offered this weekend offers something for everyone.

Find tickets and a full schedule of the weekend HERE.
